title: 1000TB SSDs could become mainstream by 2030 as Samsung plans 1000-layer NAND
description: 1Tb TLC V-NAND coming soon as Samsung accelerates QLC transition

title: Crypto scammers are fighting amongst themselves over stolen funds
description: A scammer is stealing already stolen tokens by compromising fake liquidity pools, report finds.

title: The White House is launching an AI "bill of rights"
description: The Federal Government in the US looks to catch up with Europe on legislating against automation, but could still fall short of real change.

title: Adobe: Workplace uncertainty is driving both anxiety and innovation
description: Adobe report reveals workplace uncertainty is causing headaches and creating opportunities.

title: Your boss isn't really emailing you - it's a scam
description: Researchers are warning a new sophisticated business email compromise attack is targeting victims.

title: Got an Intel laptop? Be warned: new Linux bug can literally break your screen
description: Those with Intel CPUs using integrated graphics need to be wary of a freshly released Linux update.

title: Xiaomi's cheap QLED 4K TVs offer Dolby Atmos and Vision, but with a catch
description: Xiaomi’s affordable QLED TV range has arrived in Europe.

title: EA's answer to Monster Hunter has wooden helicopters, and I love it
description: The latest gameplay trailer for EA's new Monster Hunter-alike is full of thrilling heroics and nifty gadgets.

title: Next potential Minecraft mob will make my farming life so much easier
description: Every year Minecraft players vote on a new mob to be added to the sandbox game and this one could be a game-changer.

title: Microsoft Office 365 will soon make it a lot easier to flag security threats
description: Better categorization of security threats should provide a welcome Office 365 boost.

title: The new Witcher game has multiplayer, and its worlds build themselves
description: Spin-off Witcher game Project Sirius will feature procedurally generated environments.

title: Microsoft warns Exchange users over password spray attacks
description: Crooks are trying out endless username/password combos until one eventually works

title: Atlassian is being actively exploited to compromise corporate networks
description: US Government urges organizations to patch their endpoints immediately.

title: Canonical unveils free personal Ubuntu Pro subscriptions
description: Ubuntu Pro (and an Infra-only version) are set to boost security, stability, and compliance.

title: Western Digital’s new SanDisk SSD is its fastest and toughest yet
description: Western Digital's SanDisk PRO-G40 SSD has an IP68 rating, 2700MB/s write speed, and is compatible with USB-C and Thunderbolt 3.

title: Google Cloud launches AI-powered medical imaging platform
description: New Google Cloud medical platform is designed to shift the focus back onto patient care.

title: Canceled by Netflix: it's the end of the road for Firefly Lane
description: We'd have bet on Firefly Lane for the long run, but it turns out it'll be two and out.

title: Overwatch 2 launch plagued by long queues and DDoS attacks
description: Players have found themselves waiting hours to get in Overwatch 2.

title: Steam Deck's free update finally lets me use the Spice Girls as a boot-up video
description: Valve has released a beta update for its Steam Deck which lets you add a boot-up video for when it switches on.

title: Nvidia RTX 4090 GPU shows blistering frame rates in Overwatch 2
description: RTX 4080 graphics cards can also drive super-smooth gameplay at 1440p, Nvidia boasts.

title: Disney Plus on PS5 just got a long-overdue upgrade
description: Disney Plus has finally added support for 4K streaming on the PS5 version of the app.

title: Google Pixel 4 gets its final guaranteed update, just in time for the Pixel 7
description: The Pixel 4 and Pixel 4 XL are now getting their October 2022 software update, but this is likely the end of the line for them.

title: Blizzard says "mass DDoS" attack stopped users from playing Overwatch 2
description: First hours of Overwatch 2 weren't exactly fun, with many players unable to connect to servers.

title: Netflix's Jeffrey Dahmer series almost broke a Stranger Things 4 record
description: Stranger Things season 4 nearly lost one of its crowns to a Netflix rival, according to the streamer's latest data.

title: Canceled Nintendo game would have mashed Zelda with Final Fantasy Tactics
description: Heroes of Hyrule was the tactical Zelda games that never was, but could have been.

title: Google’s long-awaited Nest mesh router upgrade supports Wi-Fi 6E connectivity
description: Dubbed the Nest Wifi Pro, the new device connects to the 6GHz spectrum for connection speeds and supports the revamped Home app.
